Superheroes Save the Day

So it is a bright day and a school is going to a zoo to look at the gorillas and lions. But what they see is not that. They face a fierce enemy who plans on doing something horrific. It could result in the end of life as we know it it, if the children don’t come together to stop this fierce foe. Can they defeat the super villain in time to protect everyone and everything…? The whole world rests in the balance of just three children, can they save the world...?!
